articles.title: 'Golden tickets' on the cards for NSF grant reviewers - Nature.com
articles.description: The agency is considering giving peer reviewers one-time vetoes to push through support for unconventional science.
articles.content:
The foundation is weighing up ideas for ways to fund high-risk, high-reward research.Credit: B Christopher/Alamy
